panels.description: Number of transactions executed by the connected clients
panels.title: Transactions/s

panels.description: The number of procedure invocation per 5 minutes, also includes procedures being replicated into partition replicas, so it does not equal the number of transactions issued by clients
panels.title: Procedure invocations
999th percentile request execution time (whole transaction path)
Max procedure execution time (just the procedure)

panels.description: The number of transactions (that is, stored procedures) initiated on behalf of the client that have yet to be completed.
panels.title: Unfinished Transactions VoltDB knows about
Finished Transactions VoltDB is about to send back to the client
Client transaction rate by connected host
Clock skew matrix (worst in selected time range)

panels.description: Rebalance happens in segments. All metrics describing 'average' of some kind refer to the average across segments.
panels.title: Recent rebalances
